articles.title: Setback for Team India ahead of IND vs AFG World Cup match: Shubman Gill to miss match against Afghanistan in Delhi - Times of India
articles.description: In a setback for Team India, Shubman Gill will be sidelined for their upcoming ODI match against Afghanistan. His absence was conspicuous in the opening match against Australia due to a bout of dengue fever. The BCCI has confirmed that Gill won't be
